guide:
Let NinaWitch guide you through the enigmatic halls of
destiny, where past, present, and future converge.
scroll: Scroll down to immerse yourself in the world of magic

manifesto.p1: Not every magical candle should be lit by ordinary hands. Certain ritualsâ€”if not performed at the right time and in the right wayâ€”can lose their direction or vanish midway.
manifesto.p2: Therefore, for every ritual you entrust, NiNa will be the one to light the candles, draw circles, craft sigils, recite incantations, call forth names, and close the gates upon completion.
manifesto.p3: You don't need to do anything except to sincerely believe and trust that these rituals already exist in your life.ğŸ‘‰ You donâ€™t need to strain yourself learning how to "do it right."ğŸ‘‰ All you need is to be presentâ€”in trust and quietness.ğŸ‘‰ Leave the restâ€”to me.
manifesto.p4: I am the keeper of the flame. I stand between you and the universe. Each ritual I perform on your behalf will be conducted with reverenceâ€”sacrednessâ€”and absolute privacy. ğŸ
